#summary Release plan

= IO-Tools release plan =

Release schedule for IO-Tools.

== Version 1.1 ==
_ (WIP Scheduled for jan 2009) _

 * Publish release on repo1. [http://code.google.com/p/io-tools/issues/detail?id=6 Issue#6]
 * Add other formats (!OpenOffice, Word) [http://code.google.com/p/io-tools/issues/detail?id=3 Issue#3]
 * `BufferedOutputStream` to write to a slow `OutputStream`
 * `ReadAheadInputStream` to read from a slow `InputStream`

== Version 1.0.7 ==
_ (Released on Nov 24, 2008) _
 * Package rename to shorten package names and rearrange classes (sorry for that)
 * Added `SizeReaderInputStream` and `SizeRecorderOutputStream`

== Version 1.0.6 ==
_ (Releasd on Nov 18, 2008) _
 * [http://code.google.com/p/io-tools/issues/detail?id=2 Issue#2] Java 1.4 compatibility.
 * [http://code.google.com/p/io-tools/issues/detail?id=5 Issue#5] Formats part ( _wazstream_ ) separated from `InputStream` and `OutputStream` ( _easystream_ ) 

== Version 1.0 ==
_ (released on nov 10, 2008) _

 * Tools for file format detect: Base64, XML, PKCS#7, ZIP, PDF
 * Recursive format detection
 * Junit and documentaton.

== Version 0.1 == 
_ (released on oct 22, 2008) _
 * Initial project build with Eclipse and Maven
 * Tools for reading from an `InputStream` the data written to an `OutputStream`
 * Junit and documentation on wiki.
